page.title: 15Childrens' Games-Gloucester
page.content: of the circle.Those you hit out you win.Nowadays each player has a marble. The player who hits the others marble keeps them.Children in everyarea have different rules at play. In our school we have these:- " Stops"if anyone stops the marble-even accidentally the player can shout "Stops" and move it futher along. "Tips"-this rule means that tipping or glancing the other players marble counts as a hit. "Gutts straight"when this has been shouted the other player returns it to the gutter.
